subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm Pt
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm
Pt

PARIS HILTON OUT OF JAIL!
Almost
unbelievably, Paris Hilton has been released from jail
after just three days and ordered to spend the rest of her
sentence under house arrest in her mansion. Officals cite a
"medical condition" as the reason for her release but would
not
say what it is. There is absolute outrage over her
being let
out of jail and Showbiz Tonight has it covered
like no other
entertainment news show. We are
coast-to-coast with the latest
developments, the anger and
the protests over the decision. So
be sure to watch a
Showbiz Tonight special report featuring the
most
opinionated and knowledgeable experts out there! It is
going to be a wild ride on TV's most provocative
entertainment
news program, Showbiz Tonight!

ROBIN GIVENS TELLS ALL!
Mike Tyson's ex-wife,
Robin Givens, tells her disturbing tale
of abuse! The
former "Head of the Class" star opens up like
never before
about surviving her devastating marriage,
including her
painful claims that the boxer brutally beat and
even raped
her!Robin Givens -- it's the emotional and revealing
interview you'll see only on Showbiz Tonight.


SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY
Paris Hilton
out of jail: Is that what you call justice?
VOTE AT
CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT

EMAIL
